response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This innovative solution has been meticulously designed to revolutionize the way you operate in your field. With its cutting-edge features and unparalleled capabilities, it promises to significantly enhance efficiency and productivity. Given its exceptional value and the benefits it offers, we are offering this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. We believe this is an attractive deal that reflects both the quality of our product and our commitment to providing exceptional value to our clients. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions.", "product_price": 1200000}
